events.text:
The threat of the finfolk can no longer be ignored. They've shown brutish nature and for that they must be slaughtered.
Go back to their base and bring me 15 of the amulets found on their heads as proof of their demise.
Success on doing so, will reward you with a generous bounty.

You have the amulets? Well done, we were worried this situation would get out of hand.
As promised, no good deed goes unnoticed. Here's your reward.
